author: breser
msg: Follow-up to r1601496: Fix generation of zip files.
* tools/dist/dist.sh: Export po-update.sh separately so it doesn't have CRLF
line endings which causes it to fail to run (shell tries to use the CR as
part of the commands).  I could have just changed the eol-style on
po-update.sh from native, but I suspect it would keep being changed back.
